strings.Value: {n}Harrim fiddles with his beard pensively.{/n} "Do you remember the Skjegge clan who came to us, begging us to save them? You agreed to help them back then, but we never got around to it. Sometimes I wonder what happened to them..."

"They probably died. Or returned home in disgrace... But what's the difference? There's a lesson for all of us, {Name}: don't go after the treasures of the dead, unless you are ready to join them. It was their pride that unmade them. Pride and greed..."
